title: Square Neck Puff Sleeve Midi Dress
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a women's midi dress with a square neckline, short puff sleeves, fitted bodice, and A-line skirt, in soft pastel lavender color, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Square neckline with reinforced facing; short puff sleeves with elasticated cuffs; fitted bodice with darts; A-line skirt cut on bias for drape; invisible zipper closure at center back; hem finished with double fold; all seams overlocked.
provenance: Inspired by current square neck trend in women's dresses, adapted for commercial production with comfortable fit and versatile styling.
design_text:
Square Neck Puff Sleeve Midi Dress (SQN001)
Colors: Pastel Lavender, Soft White, Muted Rose
Fabrics: Cotton Poplin, Linen Blend
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: Dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: Short puff sleeves
Neckline: Square neck
Length: Midi
Style / Fit: F, i, t, t, e, d,  , b, o, d, i, c, e,  , w, i, t, h,  , f, l, a, r, e, d,  , s, k, i, r, t
Trims & details: Invisible back zipper, Waist seam, Topstitching along neckline, Lightly gathered sleeve head
Techpack: available
